setting.title: Settings
setting.joinSetting: Join Settings (Whose friend list you joined)
setting.hideSkin: Show skin in the top right corner
setting.xuiderrorMessage: Please check if your GamerTag is correct!
locale.JoinsMessage: Jump into the game and check it out!
notify.title: Announcement
notify.placeholder: Please confirm you have read the above content
notify.text1: Enter "I have read" or "我已阅读" or "我已閱讀" to continue accessing:
notify.text3: First, add the friend 'HelloMC25' in Minecraft, then stay on the 'Friends' tab (where 'Joinable Realms' and 'Joinable Friends' are displayed). Return to the webpage, click the settings button in the bottom right, select 'HelloMC25,' and then select the room. After clicking, check the operation status displayed at the bottom of the webpage. If successful, return to the game to see if the room appears.
step.title: Welcome to this website
step.text1: I will guide you through how to use this website. Of course, you can also visit the
step.text3: . If you are an old user, you can click the X in the upper right corner to close this guide.
step.joinOneText: First, click the settings button below.
step.joinTwoText1: Click the recommended friend below (the name will be copied), then
step.joinTwoText3: and add the friend in the game
step.joinThreeText: Enter your username below, then click Generate XUID, and it will be filled in automatically.
step.joinLastText: Finally, select your favorite room below and click “Show Room”. After it shows that you’ve joined successfully, open the game, and you’ll see the room on the “Worlds” page.
step.showText: If you want your room to appear on this website, you need to complete “Step 2: Join a Room,” then enable Multiplayer in your map settings, select ‘Friends of Friends,’ and enter the map.
step.expText: You can click the avatar to view the host user's full skin, click the name to automatically copy it to the clipboard, and click the room name to view room information
ai.initContent: This is the AI Assistant. How can I help you today?
